member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.Queuing.QueuingEngine.GetDataSession
member.summary: Get the current Data Session
member.remarks: This method is used, together with , to ensure that a single Data Session (and thus database connection) is used for all the work done in a transaction. If no current Data Session exists, a new one is created. Otherwise, the existing is returned and a reference counter is increased. After each GetDataSession call, a must be performed (also in case of exceptions).

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.Queuing.QueuingEngine.ReleaseDataSession
member.summary: Release the Data Session obtained by .
member.remarks: This method decreases the Data Session reference counter and disposes the Data Session if the counter reaches 0.
